name: Armityle the Chaos Phantasm
text:
"Uria, Lord of Searing Flames" + "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder" + "Raviel, Lord of Phantasms"
Cannot be Special Summoned, except with "Dimension Fusion Destruction". Unaffected by Trap effects, and is only affected by the effects of Spell Cards during the turn they are applied. Cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn, if this card is in face-up Attack Position, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls and perform damage calculation, also this card's ATK becomes 10,000 during that damage calculation only. This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can give control of this card to your opponent. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card's control was changed this turn: Banish all cards you control, then switch control of this card to its owner.
